resources.string: We are very sorry, but a fatal JavaScript error occurred. This application is based on a progressive web app, which uses newer web standards. These web page based files are displayed using the Android WebView component. Please try to update this component using the Play Store by clicking the Button below.
If the update did not solve the problem please send a feedback including the information below (you may copy it from here and paste it to the feedback form)
Using the "Back"-Button will terminate this online game! To navigate your phone e.g. to share the game link use the "Home"-Button. The online game will now stay active for some time.
